title: State v. Pamela Lanier – Episode 1 – Doctrine of Chances
description:
April 23, 2018 / The team investigates the case of Pam Lanier, who was convicted of murdering her husband Dorian largely due to an odd rule of evidence known as the Doctrine of Chances.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon. Additional scoring music by Kai Engel and Nctrnm.

This episode was sponsored by Blue Apron, Quicken Loans, and ThirdLove.

www.BlueApron.com/Undisclosed 

www.RocketMortgage.com/Undisclosed 

www.ThirdLove.com/Undisclosed 

#undisclosed #freepamlanier
